VALIDATION.EMAIL: Must be a valid email address
VALIDATION.FILL_REQUIRED_FIELDS_ENABLE_SAVE: Fill the required fields to save

LAYOUT.NO_CONNECTION: Can't connect to server. Check if the requested module is installed or if your network has access to the internet.

PRESENTER.DESCRIPTION: Simple and integrated vision of your organization data. Visualize your strategic information through charts, quickly crossing data between different data sources.

MAPS.DESCRIPTION: Have a broader view of localized strategic information. Discover how your business goes in each location and prepare to grow your business worldwide.

SPEAKNOW.DESCRIPTION: The enterprise social network that will shorten the distance between you and your client. Get direct feedback through polls and forms at your own need.

COLLECTOR.DESCRIPTION: Intelligent search to social media has its name. Discover what is said about your company or topics of interest in major social networks and the Web.
